article.title: SAIC Awarded Task Order to Support Joint Forces Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a task order by the U.S. Defense Department to support the U.S. Joint Forces Command Joint Capability Development Directorate in the areas of engineering, analysis, test and evaluation. The task order has a total value of more than $81 million if all options are exercised.
